mapper.select: SELECT * from board order by convert(integer,seq) offset 0 rows fetch next 10 rows only;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board ( seq , title , writer , writeDate , viewCount , textWrite ) VALUES ((select convert(varchar(10),isnull(max (convert (integer, seq)),0)+1) from board ) , #{title} , #{writer} ,(SELECT FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS FormattedDate ) ,0 ,#{textWrite} )
mapper.update: update board set title = '${title}', writer = '${writer}',textWrite = '${textWrite}', writeDate = ( SELECT FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS FormattedDate ) where seq = '${seq}'
update board set viewCount = viewCount+1 where seq = '${seq}'
mapper.select: select * from comment where seq = '${seq}' order by convert(integer,commentSeq)
mapper.insert: insert into comment values (( select convert(varchar(10),isnull(max(convert(integer,commentSeq)),0)+1) from comment ),'${writer}','${textWrite}','${seq}',(SELECT FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyyy-MM-dd')),0)
mapper.update: update comment set heart = heart+1 where seq = '${seq}' and commentSeq = '${commentSeq}'
mapper.delete: delete from comment where seq = '${seq}' and commentSeq = '${commentSeq}'
